Description: Bimorph piezoelectric actuator 2mm width × 28mm length cantilever, 0.7mm stroke, 100VDC nominal drive
Notes: Need vendor quote - placeholder cost, critical width ≤2.3mm (from 2.5mm pitch - 1.5mm dot ÷ 2). 28mm length for 0.7mm stroke @ 100V (per piezo-voltage-options-analysis.md)
Also available in SOIC/QFN for SMT

Description: High-voltage driver for piezo (100V, capacitive load), 8-channel
Notes: ULN2803A (50V max) INADEQUATE for 100V piezo! Need HV driver IC or discrete MOSFET array (e.g., STD14NM60N 600V). COST ESTIMATE $3 (vs $0.65).
Pilot only, ~200×100×25mm, switch to injection mold for production

Bulk cap for driver IC power rail filtering (EMI suppression, inductive kickback energy absorption). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_SOL_ECO, 3 ICs; varies by architecture). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.
Ceramic bypass for driver IC (EMI suppression, high-frequency decoupling). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_PIEZO_ECO/DLX, 3 for ARCH_SOL_ECO). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.

Description: Boost conv 5V→100V for piezo drive (capacitive load)
Notes: TPS61088 maxes at ~40V! Need specialized HV boost (e.g., TPS61391 or flyback topology). COST ESTIMATE $6.50 (vs $1.95).
